content.text1: God calls us to embody Jesus to the world around us. The Go Campaign is our opportunity to intentionally invest in introducing spiritually curious people to the Jesus-centred life, through a movement of Jesus-centred churches.

content.header1: We are most us when we don’t make it about us.
content.text1: We are most us when we don’t make it about us. We are a movement compelled by Jesus’ command: to go and make disciples.” It’s how we love people. But if we stop going, we stop growing. Our world is always changing. Our culture, our cities, our families are evolving and if we want to love people, then we need to go to them. The Go Campaign is our opportunity to engage people, in our local neighbourhoods and around the world, who have never meaningfully encountered the good news of Jesus, in new and innovative ways.
